Ready to publish your plugin?

Share your creation with the Claude Code community. Publishing is free and takes just a few minutes.

Read the docsGet started
# Install CLI
npm install -g viyv-claude-plugin

# Login to market
viyv-claude-plugin login

# Publish your plugin
viyv-claude-plugin publish
